nml_option.name: config_AM_iceShelves_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member iceShelves is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_iceShelves_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_iceShelves_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the iceShelves analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_iceShelves_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_iceShelves_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: iceShelvesAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the iceShelves analysis member.

var.name: iceAreaOverIceShelves
var.description: Total ice area present where ice shelves exist
